SPOCK.plots_scheduler¶

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.airmass_altitude_plot_given_target(name_observatory, day, target, path_target_list)[source]¶
Parameters

  • name_observatory (str) – name of the observatory

  • day (date) – date in format ‘yyyy-mm-dd’

  • target (str) – name of target

  • path_target_list (path) – path of the target list

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.airmass_altitude_plot_proposition(name_observatory, telescope, day)[source]¶
Parameters

  • name_observatory (str) – name of the observatory (ex : ‘SSO’)

  • telescope (str) – name of the telescope (exx : ‘Io’)

  • day (date) – date of day in fmt “yyyy-mm-dd”

Returns

visibility plot on telescope at a given day

Return type

plot

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.airmass_altitude_plot_saved(name_observatory, telescope, day)[source]¶
Parameters

  • name_observatory (str) – name of the observatory (ex : ‘SSO’)

  • telescope (str) – name of the telescope (exx : ‘Io’)

  • day (date) – date of day in fmt “yyyy-mm-dd”

Returns

visibility plot on telescope at a given day

Return type

plot

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.charge_observatories(Name)[source]¶

charge the observatory

Parameters

Name (str) – Name of the observatory

Returns

list of the observatory

Return type

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.constraints_scores(constraints, target, observatory, start, end)[source]¶
Parameters

  • constraints (astroplan.constraints) – constraints

  • target (astroplan.FixedTarget) – target

  • observatory (observatory) – astroplan.observed

  • start (date) – start date

  • end (date) – end date

Returns

plot of the constraints scores

Return type

plot

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.gantt_chart(date_start, date_end, telescope)[source]¶
Parameters

  • date_start (date) – date start ‘yyyy-mm-dd’

  • date_end (date) – date start ‘yyyy-mm-dd’

  • telescope (str) – name of the telescope

Returns

gant chart on a given range of days

Return type

plot

SPOCK.plots_scheduler.gantt_chart_all(target_list)[source]¶
Parameters

target_list (path) – path of the target list

Returns

gant chart of all scheduled targets so far

Return type

plot
